name: NewYorker
text: By following provisions of the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920, a North Dakota company may come to control a large swath of Utah’s federal land. “The law itself is the crime—a gift to the oil and gas businesses,” @billmckibben writes. https://t.co/jKPEx8nxED
